topic: Impact of remote work on productivity (demo)

sections.title: Summary
sections.content: This demo shows the shape of a typical CAG output: summary, sections, and verdict-tagged findings.

sections.title: Background
sections.content: Remote work can change communication, focus time, and access to talent. A real run would attach citations to each claim.

findings.claim: Productivity impact is not uniform; it varies by role, tooling, and meeting load.
Fully remote always increases productivity compared to hybrid arrangements.

sections.title: Operational takeaways
sections.content: Actionable recommendations derived from verified findings.

findings.claim: Strong async practices reduce coordination overhead for distributed teams.
A single policy works well for every team without exceptions.
